summary: Transforms an RGB image tensor into YUV422 format by computing luminance (Y) and chrominance (U,V) components using BT.470‑5 M/PAL coefficients and applying horizontal 2:1 chroma subsampling, requiring an even image width.
business_intent: Enables downstream video or image processing pipelines, such as compression, broadcasting, or computer‑vision models, to work with YUV422 data that matches standard broadcast specifications.
